DOC.brief_summary: This work aim prepare obstetrics gynecology department high education health care accreditation .
DOC.detailed_description: For Institutional Capacity Educational Effectiveness use special questioner assessment ( Met Not Met Questioner ) . For Quality Assurance System Health-care use special questioner contain several item may A , B C. A= structure standard , score M= Met N=Not Met NA=Not Applicable , The B & C standard implementation standard . standard score either number observation , documentation deficiency , non compliance standard .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Female patient attend obstetrics gynecology department Medical assistant medical staff institutional employee Exclusion criterion : Female patient complain disorder include obstetrics gynecology department activity . Male patient .
